mapper.select: SELECT a.id, c.`name`, c.unit_name AS unitName, c.highest_edu AS highestEdu, c.research_direction AS researchDirection, c.project, a.s_star AS sStar FROM t_billboard_talent_related AS a LEFT JOIN t_billboard AS b ON a.billboard_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_talent_pool AS c ON a.talent_id = c.id WHERE a.billboard_id = #{billboardId} ORDER BY a.create_at DESC
